discovery.title: Discovery Error

client.body: Cannot load Client configuration, server is probably dead.

common.spinner: Making some hard magick to make things work!

content.title: Welcome to DeRivean!
content.subtitle: You're welcome to look around and start playing!

list.title: DeRivean is simple game, where you will:
list.item-0: Create your own heroes and take them to battle.
list.item-1: Gain experience in quite different way and build you kingdom.
list.item-2: Fight other players, pass stages and become most powerful king over here!

content.title: Sign-up to join World of DeRivean
content.subtitle: Just type a few things and start playing!

list.title: This is a RPG game, where you will:
list.item-1: Build up a Kingdom of Yours
list.item-2: Gain resources, XP, level up Heroes, merge them
list.item-3: Fight for becoming the greatest King over here
list.item-4: ...and a lot more awaits for you!

name.label: Player name
name.required: Please pick some nice name for you!

login.required: Please fill some login - for example your email address or just nick.

password.required: Some super secret of you is needed!

succeed.subtitle: Now you can continue to your account and start playing!
